card.name: Acidic Slime
card.text: Deathtouch When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

card.name: Act of Authority
card.text: When Act of Authority enters the battlefield, you may exile target artifact or enchantment. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile target artifact or enchantment. If you do, its controller gains control of Act of Authority.

card.name: Aerie Mystics
card.text: Flying {1}{G}{U}: Creatures you control gain shroud until end of turn.

card.name: AEthermage's Touch
card.text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. It gains "At the beginning of your end step, return this creature to its owner's hand." Then put the rest of the cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.text: Whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

card.name: Akoum Refuge

card.name: Annihilate
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Draw a card.
